channel.title: April fools
channel.description:
Anyone do anything funny for April fools?
1) My friend, whom works at a supermarket called Waitrose came up to me this morning and said "Did you hear the news about Waitrose, it burnt down!"
I replied "ughh do you want to try any harder to pull an april fools joke?"
Friend - "It's not an april fools, fred text me about it and...."
at that moment he realised that he was the one being pulled the joke on. I laughed lots.
2) I pulled one on my girlfriend/hand. I recently gave blood, and when you do this they automatically test it at a lab to check for HIV or Herpes. So I text my girlfriend this morning that i had gotten a letter from the blood testing company saying I had hepatitis C. She took the bait straight away and almost ran out of her class at college crying.
I felt kinda bad after that one.
Post your stories, if you have them.

item.title: April fools
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:23, topic:270532”][quote author=Xx R A G 3 R link=topic=357020.msg2733636#msg2733636 date=1238902006]
my mom was going on a going on a trip so i texted my brother that she had died in a plane crash and made him cry during school. lmao
[/quote]
That’s kinda mean.[/quote] meh if he was your bro you’d understand

Read full topic

item.title: April fools
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

N00b1:

i broke some milk bottles, wound my mates window down in his car, spread the glass around his seat, put a brick on the seat to… sat back and watched him get up for work… it was awesome :PP

That’s actually pretty clever.

i put ketchup on the back of my head, and like told the pe teacher i think i busted my head on the hurdles, then when they wheel chaired me in the office i got up and said april fools. got a 2 hour detention but oh well.

item.title: April fools
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Dr_Pepper:

Someone at my school got their truck wrapped in saran wrap…but ugh I didn’t do much

There is 2 highschools in my town and the student president of the school I went to dumped raw fish all over the other presidents car. So he brags in his msn about it saying “I am the king.” so the other school came and smeared every inch of his car with cow shit, and wrote into the shit “The king of shit!”

I thought it was funny.

Read full topic

Wrauld:

Next year when I don’t have spring break during April fools day, I will put ketchup packets under the girls toilet seat.

Lmao, that doesn’t require april fools, my friends and I used to do that all the time. That, and put saran wrap around the bowl.

item.title: April fools
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I really didn’t do anything special. I put a few eggs under the cups in the cupboard, so when you pull down a cup an egg falls and splatters you. I also stacked like 5 popcorn bags on top of each other on the fridge, so when you open it they all fall.(Also works with weights :)).

I wish I would of spent my April Fools day doing something else… but it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: April fools
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

I made Diet coke bombs and set them out on the locker pods at my school.

After that, I went back into my classroom and changed hoodies.

(had to wear my hood the whole time because I have a jewfro)

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:13, topic:270532”]That is my signature April fools joke, it gets them every time.

The best two I have seen today though, is topglock.com saying they are now selling fully automatic weapons, and arch linux saying they are dropping i686 support. :)[/quote]
so many people on the arch forum took the bait.

Travis taped the sink sprayer down, then asked me to get him water and when I did…I got soaked. I hate him

I’m too nice to pull any April Fools jokes.

Give it a year or two and you’ll probably have a change of heart.
[/quote]

Yeah, I probably would if I could think of any really good ones.[/quote]

pour nitric acid in his face! Thats my favorite one to do.

Haha! Hmm, I did nothing today :P.
[/quote]

I can’t connect my server. In my router I set “Inside IP” and “Outside IP” to my normal IP adress but it is still not working :(.

Is That Necessary?

On Topic:
I annouced that I have a new cat and it seems to have worked. I know it wont be April Fools day tomorrow, but tomorrow I’m planning to somehow get a scar on my face and say “It was the cat”.[/quote]
Get your mom to beat you. You deserve it.
